short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your Heroku websites active as long as your browser is running.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you find it frustrating that your newly minted website hosted on Heroku takes 10 seconds to load up? Eliminate that time by keeping your website up and running at all times with the Heroku Dyno Hacker extension.
